title: 命令问题
author: 滋银丶
txt_content:
本帖最后由 滋银丶 于 2020-2-19 23:52 编辑 
/summon minecraft:falling_block ~ ~10 ~ {BlockState:{Name:"minecraft:command_block",
Properties:{facing:"up"}},TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @p {"text":"hello","color":"blue",
"bold":true}"},Time:1}

我就想问这串指令到底错哪了
版本：1.15.2

replies.author: Chelover_C60
replies.txt_content:
转义问题？
/summon minecraft:falling_block ~ ~10 ~ {BlockState:{Name:"minecraft:command_block",
Properties:{facing:"up"}},TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @p {\"text\":\"hello\",\"color\":\"blue\",\
"bold\":true}"},Time:1}
如果不行的话，明天我在电脑上试试
